about.title: About
about.description: Hi, my name is Jonathan and i'm Full Stack developer, i have 4 years experience using technologies as PHP, React, React-Native, Javascript, VueJS. I have experience with teams work, I like to work with teams, because I learn new techniques with them. I love my work and i’m always looking forward to learn new technologies with potential to create new products with my skills and team. In my free time, i usually go to the gym or i’m studying a new language or a new technologie. I developed this web site using PHP with Laravel as a Framework.I also have other projects in others technologies (PHP, React, React Native, VueJS, Javascript, CSS, HTML) at my github.

graduate.title: MBA - Business Technology: AI, Data Scienc and Big Data
